name: launchdarkly
title: LaunchDarkly Integration
description: Integration with LaunchDarkly feature flag management system. Manage feature flags, create flags with automated tests for both variants, and remove flags from your codebase using LaunchDarkly MCP server.
author: Pandora Team

commands.name: add-feature-flag
commands.description: Add a feature flag to recent code changes - creates flag in LaunchDarkly via MCP, wraps React code, and generates tests for both variants

commands.name: remove-feature-flag
commands.description: Remove a LaunchDarkly feature flag from the codebase using the MCP server
